description: This file defines a configuration handling module for a Python project, including a dataclass 'Config' that encapsulates environment-based settings like database credentials, JWT secret, and server port. It also provides utility functions to load environment variables and return a 'Config' instance.

classes.name: Config
classes.description: A dataclass that encapsulates configuration parameters such as database settings, JWT secret, CORS origins, and server port.

methods.name: int _int(env_name: str, default: int)
methods.description: Utility function that converts an environment variable to an integer with a default fallback.

methods.name: Config get_config()
methods.description: Function that loads environment variables and returns a Config object with the current configuration.
